The transformation from god to man can take years... or 1 minute and 17 seconds.
Michael, you are the smartest person I have observed in my life so far, your videos are extremely interesting, and to top it off you are perfect for the part, your personality, mannerisms, you fit the part perfectly. But its nice to see you brought down, brought to a human level... I was afraid, I couldn't make the same mistake again, the mistake of putting someone on a pedestal no one can stand on. When they become so perfect in your eyes, the second they make a mistake or don't live up to the standards you hold them to you come to the realization they are not as perfect and godlike you thought they were, there is this cruel sting, the sting of reality, it burns your heart, its mind numbing, something you thought was concrete truth... was just foggy delusion. I needed this... even if it wasn't what you would act like in real life, at least it wasn't the perfect Michael Stevens I praised, the one I admired... the Michael Stevens I wanted to be. I do this more now, look for the flaws in what I hold as perfect, so when it all crashes down, reality doesn't sting so much. But, there is something I can put my hope in, something I can know is perfect... I hope you know who I'm talking about, because if you don't, please find it.
